attributes.action: Renounce all connections with the United States of America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people believe the relationship between the UK and the US is more than a friendship and the President of the United States 'bullies' the UK into things such as firstly deploying troops to Afghanistan and then to Iraq. The Prime Minister and the President stand side by side but we believe the UK acts as its slave to ensure its oil imports are not affected.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
